name: Canon EF 24-70mm f/2.8L II USM Lens
technical_details: 24-70mm focal length, f/2.8 maximum aperture, USM autofocus
info: The Canon EF 24-70mm f/2.8L II USM is a versatile standard zoom lens that covers a useful wide-angle to portrait-length range of focal lengths, perfect for professional photography.

name: Nikon AF-S DX NIKKOR 35mm f/1.8G Lens
technical_details: 35mm focal length, f/1.8 maximum aperture, Silent Wave Motor autofocus
info: The Nikon AF-S DX NIKKOR 35mm f/1.8G is an all-around lens that is compact, lightweight, and versatile. It's perfect for portraits, street photography, and everyday use.

name: Sony FE 24-70mm f/2.8 GM Lens
technical_details: 24-70mm focal length, f/2.8 maximum aperture, Direct Drive SSM autofocus
info: The Sony FE 24-70mm f/2.8 GM Lens is a professional-grade lens that covers a popular focal length range, perfect for a wide variety of shooting scenarios and conditions.

name: Fujifilm XF 56mm f/1.2 R Lens
technical_details: 56mm focal length, f/1.2 maximum aperture, autofocus
info: The Fujifilm XF 56mm f/1.2 R Lens is a prime portrait-length lens that provides a comfortable perspective for everyday shooting, and it's also well-suited for events and portraiture.

name: Olympus M.Zuiko Digital ED 40-150mm f/2.8 PRO Lens
technical_details: 40-150mm focal length, f/2.8 maximum aperture, High-speed Imager AF
info: The Olympus M.Zuiko Digital ED 40-150mm f/2.8 PRO is a versatile zoom lens, perfect for portraits and indoor sports with a unique collapsible design.

name: Panasonic Lumix G Leica DG Nocticron 42.5mm f/1.2 Lens
technical_details: 42.5mm focal length, f/1.2 maximum aperture, Power O.I.S. stabilization
info: The Panasonic Lumix G Leica DG Nocticron 42.5mm f/1.2 is a prime lens that offers a fast maximum aperture and is perfect for portraiture with its smooth out-of-focus quality when working with shallow depth of field techniques.

name: Sigma 18-35mm f/1.8 DC HSM Art Lens for Canon
technical_details: 18-35mm focal length, f/1.8 maximum aperture, HSM autofocus
info: The Sigma 18-35mm f/1.8 DC HSM Art Lens for Canon is a unique lens that offers a fast maximum aperture for a zoom. It's perfect for landscapes, portraits, still life, snapshots, casual, and close-ups.

name: Nikon AF-S NIKKOR 70-200mm f/2.8E FL ED VR Lens
technical_details: 70-200mm focal length, f/2.8 maximum aperture, Silent Wave Motor autofocus, Vibration Reduction
info: The Nikon AF-S NIKKOR 70-200mm f/2.8E FL ED VR Lens is a telephoto zoom characterized by a constant f/2.8 maximum aperture for consistent performance throughout the zoom range, making it ideal for sports, events, and portrait photography.

name: Sony FE 70-200mm f/2.8 GM OSS Lens
technical_details: 70-200mm focal length, f/2.8 maximum aperture, Direct Drive SSM autofocus, Optical SteadyShot image stabilization
info: The Sony FE 70-200mm f/2.8 GM OSS Lens is a telephoto zoom that is characterized by its bright f/2.8 constant maximum aperture and optical image stabilization, making it ideal for capturing fast-moving subjects.

name: Fujifilm XF 23mm f/2 R WR Lens
technical_details: 23mm focal length, f/2 maximum aperture, autofocus, weather-resistant design
info: The Fujifilm XF 23mm f/2 R WR Lens offers a classic wide-angle perspective that is especially well-suited for street, landscape, and architectural photography. The lens's design is weather-resistant, making it an excellent companion for travel and outdoor shooting.

name: Canon EF 85mm f/1.2L II USM Lens
technical_details: 85mm focal length, f/1.2 maximum aperture, USM autofocus
info: The Canon EF 85mm f/1.2L II USM is a medium telephoto lens that delivers superb image quality, making it ideal for portraits and low-light photography.

name: Nikon AF-S NIKKOR 24-70mm f/2.8E ED VR Lens
technical_details: 24-70mm focal length, f/2.8 maximum aperture, Silent Wave Motor autofocus, Vibration Reduction
info: The Nikon AF-S NIKKOR 24-70mm f/2.8E ED VR is a versatile and professional grade zoom lens perfect for landscapes, portraits, weddings and events, studio, and general photography.

name: Sony FE 85mm f/1.4 GM Lens
technical_details: 85mm focal length, f/1.4 maximum aperture, Direct Drive SSM autofocus
info: The Sony FE 85mm f/1.4 GM Lens is a fast, medium telephoto lens well-suited for portraiture and other situations where focus control is paramount.

name: Fujifilm XF 16-55mm f/2.8 R LM WR Lens
technical_details: 16-55mm focal length, f/2.8 maximum aperture, Linear Motor autofocus, weather-resistant design
info: The Fujifilm XF 16-55mm f/2.8 R LM WR is a versatile zoom lens that covers a wide-angle to portrait-length range of focal lengths, suitable for a wide variety of shooting scenarios.

name: Olympus M.Zuiko Digital ED 300mm f/4 IS PRO Lens
technical_details: 300mm focal length, f/4 maximum aperture, High-speed Imager AF, image stabilization
info: The Olympus M.Zuiko Digital ED 300mm f/4 IS PRO is a super-telephoto lens characterized by its relatively compact and lightweight profile, making it well-suited to handheld shooting applications.

name: Panasonic Lumix G X Vario 12-35mm f/2.8 II ASPH. POWER O.I.S. Lens
technical_details: 12-35mm focal length, f/2.8 maximum aperture, Power O.I.S. stabilization
info: The Panasonic Lumix G X Vario 12-35mm f/2.8 II ASPH. POWER O.I.S. Lens is a versatile zoom that covers wide-angle to portrait-length perspectives. Perfect for day-to-day shooting, as well as for events and travel.

name: Sigma 50mm f/1.4 DG HSM Art Lens for Nikon F
technical_details: 50mm focal length, f/1.4 maximum aperture, HSM autofocus
info: The Sigma 50mm f/1.4 DG HSM Art Lens for Nikon F is a high-performance, large-diameter prime lens with a focal length that's perfect for any type of photography.

name: Canon RF 28-70mm f/2L USM Lens
technical_details: 28-70mm focal length, f/2 maximum aperture, USM autofocus
info: The Canon RF 28-70mm f/2L USM is a unique standard zoom lens, characterized by its exceptionally bright f/2 maximum aperture. This lens is suitable for working in low-light conditions and also offers increased control over depth of field.

name: Sony FE 24-105mm f/4 G OSS Lens
technical_details: 24-105mm focal length, f/4 maximum aperture, Direct Drive SSM autofocus, Optical SteadyShot image stabilization
info: The Sony FE 24-105mm f/4 G OSS Lens is a wide-angle to short-telephoto zoom lens designed for E-mount mirrorless cameras. Its flexible focal length range along with an f/4 maximum aperture makes it ideal for a wide range of shooting styles.

name: Fujifilm GF 110mm f/2 R LM WR Lens
technical_details: 110mm focal length, f/2 maximum aperture, Linear Motor autofocus, weather-resistant design
info: The Fujifilm GF 110mm f/2 R LM WR is a medium telephoto lens for the G-mount GFX camera system. It is ideally suited for portraiture and other scenarios where a slightly longer-than-normal perspective and shallow depth of field are desired.
